document.full_text: suspected chinese hackers tried to steal the passwords of hundreds of google email account holders, including those of senior u.s. government officials, chinese activists and journalists, the internet company said.
document.title: google reveals gmail hacking, says likely from china
lines_and_colors: suspected chinese hackers tried to steal the passwords of hundreds of google email account holders, including those of senior u.s. government officials, chinese activists and journalists, the internet company said.
